EmptyComfortService
service in module accessimapEditeurDerApp

Description

Methods

  • calcEmptyComfort(feature)

    Calculate the empty area around an element. For a line path, we extend the path on the extremities, For a text feature, we return a rect bigger than 7px of the original bounding box

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    featureObject

    d3 object

    Returns
    DOMElement

    element to add to DOM representing the empty comfort
